Articles.Content:
Hi! I'm going to buy KSP right now, but I wanted to use Danny2462 referral link, so he receives a bit of money. But, the URL to buy KSP has changed, do referral links work anymore? Can admins add an auto-redirection to new link when we visit the old page?

I don't know how to set the URL so it works correctly. Do you know what I have to write?

Thanks for helping me!

-Sorry for bad english
Moving this over to the Kerbal Network, the best place for that sort of question. (Sorry I don't have an answer for you.)
